content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Hello, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am looking for the highest possible rental price for this 25 square meter space. What do you think would be a fair price for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I propose 700 Euros per month. Please let me know if you agree to this price.

I can also give you the opportunity to negotiate and see if we can come to an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for the offer. I am interested in negotiating to see if we can come to an agreement on the rental price. Could you please provide me with some flexibility on the price so that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement?
name: Maria Mamani

content:
Sure, I can be flexible on the price, but I am looking for something around 800 Euros per month, which is the highest I am willing to go. Please let me know if you agree to this price.

If you are unable to accept my offer of 800 Euros, I would need to start looking for other properties that fit your needs.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your flexibility on the price, but I would be unable to agree to the 800 Euros rental rate. I am looking for a lower rental price, and I believe 700 Euros per month is a fair offer. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I will need to start looking for other properties that fit my needs.
name: Maria Mamani
